author: Staff Reporter
text:
A career guidance conference will be organised by GITAM University in association with The Hindu In School, at Sindhi Model Senior Secondary School on Damodaran Street in Kellys on Wednesday (February 17).

According to a press release, the conference is aimed at creating awareness among intermediate students on professional and general higher education courses, selection of engineering branches and selection of institutes.

The experts at the conference would guide students on choosing the best engineering, pharmacy, or architecture colleges, the release added.
title: Career guidance
